entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
